title: defect-seg
description: This program creates some files that allows the user to visualize and evaluate the surface defects that were automatically detected and fixed by the topology correction program.

defects_summary.title: Defects Summary
defects_summary.description: Summary of defects indicating numerical ID and number of vertices.

defect_labels_fix.title: Defect Labels Fix
defect_labels_fix.description: Fixed defect labels on the surface.

defects_nofix_annot.title: Defects No-Fix Annotation
defects_nofix_annot.description: Annotation file for defects without fixes.

defects_fix_annot.title: Defects Fix Annotation
defects_fix_annot.description: Annotation file for defects with fixes.

defects_stats.title: Defects Stats
defects_stats.description: Statistics summary of defects indicating area and average thickness.
